contentrichtext.text: '''Yuliang Zheng''' is a Professor at the [[University of North Carolina at Charlotte]]. He is best known for inventing the [[Signcryption]] cryptographic primitive that combines the digital signature and encryption operations into one single step. He also invented the [[HAVAL]] hash function, SPEED cipher, and [[STRANDOM]] pseudo-random number generator.
